c28b535e91cb73f7630230695ef52fdf655e46e4.commitMessage: Issue #5616: Remove remnants of cobertura usage

f65b17cbc30795247fef3077cce16a8bb53e9ffc.commitMessage: Issue #2616: Fix CatchParameterName check violations in Checkstyle code

abfc952fd0ed88f6246b1d969a8a980ea63f0bd6.commitMessage:
Fix suspicious getters and setters. #1555

Fixes `SuspiciousGetterSetter` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports suspicious getter or setter methods. A getter or setter is suspicious if it accesses a different field than would be expected by its name.

6d5c0da42fa54ceabbc1959e9db354ed64a2ff86.commitMessage:
Remove unnecessary this keyword. #1555

Fixes `UnnecessaryThis` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports on any unnecessary uses of this in the code. Using this to disambiguate a code reference may easily become unnecessary via automatic refactorings, and is discouraged by many coding styles.
 For example:
 ```
 this.a = 3;
 ```

546f336e25b26d072f96e2cda139b885858ed5b0.commitMessage:
Prevent corrupting Properties with non-String data. #1555

Fixes `UseOfPropertiesAsHashtable` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports any calls to the java.util.Hashtable methods put(), putAll() or get() on a java.util.Properties object. For reasons lost to history, Properties inherits from Hashtable, but use of those methods is discouraged to prevent corruption of properties values with non-String data.

d9415ac10cfda8adb3eb3fb729f6334369ad931d.commitMessage: Fix PMD violation from 'migrating' ruleset, issue #869

1dacd5303bfe94b9d5476059b6a5676146d96708.commitMessage:
Merged catch blocks into one where possible

Pull #825

bd8a1a545fd1bc19d5f84c5061c5383796a7c588.commitMessage:
New check FileTabCharacter  for ensuring that any files does not contain a tab character. It is now used to ensure the documentation files do not contain tabs.

Also introduced Utils.closeQuietly to clean up code.

e50e1fcd1c17ba1f73d11df38382907cc163a1d1.commitMessage:
Use the new syntactic sugar "for loop".

End of the cosmetic changes.

35d1673788bbbac8263fdb69275dc6a63b095a24.commitMessage: Making local variables final where possible.

moved property expansion from api package to private method of ConfigurationLoader (bug #670594)
also added property expansion of ANT properties

a16368d3f85e8ad068ebf65a2025c8cf90cf7d3b.commitMessage:
close the InputStream for property file loading explicitly
instead of relying on the stream's finalize method
